Name: Lf Fr Wires
Specifications: Size Sq Mm: 1 ; Color: Yellow ; Length: 180 ; Insulation Type: LF-FR ; Heat Resistance: 70 degrees C ; Copper Grade: 99.97% Electrolytic grade Copper ; Eco Certifications: RoHS & REACH Compliant
Key_Features: Flame retardant , Lead free PVC insulation , Rodent protection , High abrasion resistant , 99.97%  high purity copper , RoHS Complaint , REACH complaint
Full_Description: Polycab LF FR flame retardant and lead free wires bring together the highest quality raw materials for a high performance wire. These wires have a high degree of flame retardance, abrasion and chemical resistance and are made using electrolytic grade copper of the highest quality.
